other_tests.findings: Patient showed symptoms of primary hypothyroidism and a suprasellar mass.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Nearly complete neuroimaging resolution of the mass within one month of treatment.

other_tests.date: Initial: Not specified; Follow-up: 1 month after initial visit
other_tests.findings: Initial imaging showed a large homogeneously enhancing sellar lesion with suprasellar extension that compressed the optic chiasm. Follow-up imaging revealed nearly complete resolution of the mass and normalization of the pituitary gland.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Rapid regression of the pituitary mass occurred within weeks following the initiation of treatment, contrary to previous reports of months.
